title: 널 종료 문자열
content:
[[=]]
  **<<** [[[aiad-homescreen|허브]]] | [[[alert-lockdown-initiated|제I부]]] | [[[command-query-separation|제II부]]] | [[[superencipherment|제III부]]]  | [[[clock-multiplier|제IV부]]] | ##blue|Part V: 널 종료 문자열## **>>**
[[/=]]
----
[[include info:start]]
**널 종료 문자열** 
**저자:** [[*user LurkD]]
**원작:** http://www.scpwiki.com/null-terminating-string
**역자:** [[*user Salamander724]]
[[include info:end]]

[[module css]]
.hover {
}
.hover:hover {
  text-decoration: none;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.hover span { display: none;}
.hover:hover span {
    position: absolute;
    display: inline;
    margin: auto;
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    background: #FFF;
    border: 2px solid #34B;
    color: #000;
    padding: 1em;
}
.hover:hover span span {
    position: relative;
    margin: auto;
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    border: none;
    padding: 0;
}
[[/module]]
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
그래서 그게 자네의 공식 입장인가?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
현재로선, 그렇지. 방해공작의 가능성을 배제하고 있지는 않지만... 물론 내사해 보면 나오겠지.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
그럼 됐어. 이사관에게는 그리 말해두지.  그치는 서버가 아무 이유 없이 그냥 불타버린다고 생각하지 않거든. 솔직히 까놓고 말하자면 나도 거기에 동의하는 편이고.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
와하하.  문제는 일이 봉쇄된 기지 안에서 벌어졌다는 거야. 들어간 것도 나온 것도 아무 것도 없지. 그러니 사건에 대한 로그가 존재한다 해도 다른 파일들과 함께 날아갔을 걸.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
그래서 우린 원인을 영영 모를 거란 말인가?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
녹아서 화산재가 되어버린 걸 뒤져 보겠다면야 말리지는 않겠네.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
안 해. 사태가 서버실로 제한되었기에 모두들 안심하고 있는 것 같아.  외부의 백업이 없으면 아무것도 복구되지 못할 거야.

글라송은 어찌 되었나?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 30px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
어차피 퇴역시킬 예정이었잖나.

지금 알렉산드라가 17과 19의 서버를 동시에 맡고 있어. 임시 기호 연결을 설정하고 뭐 그런 것들. 하드웨어만 교체하면 돼.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
좋군.  AIAD는 별 문제 없어 보이니, 제17기지의 복구가 빨리 끝내도록 돕지. 새로 예산 요청을 한다 해도 난 놀라지 않을 게야.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
그러지. 그리고 자네 부서의 5세대 개발 말인데.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
3세대보다는 나은 결과가 나오길 바라자고, 최소한!
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
3세대 얘기는 //하지도 마//. //절대로.//
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
그래, 미안하군.

그러고 보니 이 사단이 나는 동안 알렉산드라의 행동은 어땠나?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
내가 보기엔 별 문제 없어. 계속 바쁘게 부려먹고 있지.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@

::연결됨::
----
암호화된 인터넷 
경로 생성됨.
[[/div]]
.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 100px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #933F65; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#933F65; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#933f65), to(#933F65)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#933f65, #933F65); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#933f65, #933F65); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
[[span class="hover"]] [[span]] big _
크다 [[/span]] 01100010
01101001
01100111   [[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/crom_headturn_x_1.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
